dt-api.name: button().text()
dt-api.summary: Get / set the text for the selected button

type.returns: The current display string from the button.
type.description: Get the display text for the selected button

type.parameter: Text to display in the selected button. This is written to the button as HTML, so HTML tags can be used and will be displayed rendered in the button.
type.returns: DataTables API instance with the selected button in the result set, available for chaining further operations on the buttons.
type.description: Set the display text for the selected button

dt-api.description: This method provides the ability to dynamically get and set the display text of one or more buttons. This can be useful if an interaction (such as row selection) changes the behaviour of a button, to let the end user know what that change in behaviour is.

example.title: Get the text for button index 1
Use an action to display a button activation counter
